duties_responsibilities.duty: Design Ship Hull, Mechanical and Electrical (HM&E), Power Plant Systems, or controls engineering using AutoCAD and other drafting programs.
Utilize SKM Power Tools for electrical design.
Analyze customer behavior and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine strategies.
Work on electrical design projects for ships and power plant systems.
Collaborate with a team of engineers to achieve project goals.

education_certification.credential: BS Degree in Electrical Engineering from an accredited school.
